text: The "Golden Girls" of Bulgaria () refers to the Bulgarian rhythmic gymnasts that dominated the 1980s by winning gold medals: * Iliana Raeva * Anelia Ralenkova * Lilia Ignatova * Diliana Georgieva * Bianka Panova * Adriana Dunavska * Elizabeth Koleva Category:Nicknamed groups of Olympic competitors Category:Bulgarian rhythmic gymnasts
title: Golden Girls of Bulgaria
